description:
The many great cats throughout Japan`s history are back to strut their stuff in a new season. They continue to leave their mark on history, doing whatever they want, but what else would you expect from a cat? They get bored fast, and love to sharpen their claws and take naps. They might be scared of water and loud noises, but the amount of energy they display when they get excited is something to see! What kind of history will we see them create this time around?
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
You can`t have a revolution without muscle, and nobody during the Bakumatsu had more muscle than Saigo Takamori. See how the big brother of the Meiji restoration helped take down the Shogunate!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kindness Is Strength: Saigo Takamori! Moving Up the Ranks
Yasashisa wa Chikara Nari, Saigou Takamori! Dondon Shusse Hen
やさしさは力なり, 西郷隆盛! ~どんどん出世編~

REGULAR.description:
Whether or not Abe no Seimei had actual supernatural powers might be in doubt, but his status as a superstar of Heian Kyoto can`t be denied. Learn about the onmyoji who would go on to be called the Merlin of Japan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: He Can Do Anything, That Abe no Seimei!
Nandemo Yaru Ka, Abe no Seimei!
なんでもやる課, 安倍晴明!

REGULAR.description:
Sakamoto Ryoma`s thirst for adventure put him at the center of the action during the fall of the shogunate. And how can you have high adventure in the 1800s without your own ship?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bakumatsu ni Ryouma Ari! Venture Zamurai Hen
Ryoma in the Bakumatsu! Tales of the Venture Samurai
幕末に龍馬あり! ~ベンチャー侍編~

REGULAR.description:
Factional disputes always a concern with politics, but when it escalates into total chaos, it can spell the downfall of a government. And as the strength of the Ashikaga shogunate was sapped by conflicts within, it would set a stage for century long tumult of the Sengoku period...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nani ga Nandaka, Ounin no Ran!
What the Heck Is Happening?! The Onin War
なにがなんだか, 応仁の乱!

REGULAR.description:
There are burial mounds that still stand in Japan in modern times as monuments to important cats of the ancient past. Learn all about them in in this episode.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Build Them Together! The Kofun Period
Minna de Tsukurou, Kofun Jidai!
みんなでつくろう, 古墳時代!

REGULAR.description:
Get a look at Murasaki Shikibu`s classical literary romance epic, and see how she had the court of Heian Japan on pins and needles waiting for each new installment.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Appreciation for a Classic! The Tale of Meowji!
Dai Hit Onrei, Nyanji Monogatari!
大ヒット御礼, 猫氏物語!

REGULAR.description:
The Maeda clan were loyal subjects of the Oda and Toyotomi clans as they exerted influence over Sengoku Japan. This episode is all about one of it`s most notable figures, and doting husband, Maeda Toshiie!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fuufu de Norikire, Maeda Toshiie!
You and Your Wife Can Do It, Maeda Toshiie!
夫婦で乗り切れ, 前田利家!

REGULAR.description:
There are a lot of smart cats throughout history, but it takes a lot to be deified as a god of learning! Learn about how the scholarly Sugawara no Michizane earned his reputation for wisdom, and how his influence extended into well after his death.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s the Heavenly Scholar, Sugawara no Michizane!
Tenjin-sama Dazo, Sugawara no Michizane!
天神様だぞ, 菅原道真!

REGULAR.description:
The difference between Date Masamune and other Sengoku warlords? He made it look good. This time we`re going to see exactly how the One-Eyed Dragon tried to unify Japan!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tenka o Toruze Date Masamune! Yappa Date Da ne Hen
Time to Take the Nation, Date Masamune! The Story of Dandy Date
天下を取るぜ伊達政宗! ~やっぱ伊達だね編~

REGULAR.description:
The Shinsengumi were famously fierce fighters, and it`s said Okita Soji was the the best among them. This is his story, from days training in the Shieikan dojo, to his position as captain of the Shinsengumi`s first unit.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Invincible! Adorable! Okita Soji!
Muteki! Suteki! Okita Souji
無敵! 素敵! 沖田総司!

REGULAR.description:
While the cat known as Minamoto no Yoshitsune struggled under his brother`s animosity, there was at least one bright spot in his dogged life: the beautiful shirabyoshi dancer, Shizuka Gozen, who was often at his side.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Quietly Legendary Idol, Shizuka Gozen!
Shizuka Naru Aidol Densetsu, Shizuka Gozen!
静かなるアイドル伝説, 静御前!

REGULAR.description:
The Yagyu clan were famous as the stewards of the Yagyu Shinkage-ryu school, and even among that group of master swordcats, one name stood out from the others: the legendary samurai, Yagyu Jubei!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Doramusuko Neko, Yagyuu Juubei!
The Wildcat of a Son, Yagyu Jubei!
どら息子ねこ, 柳生十兵衛!

REGULAR.description:
The Kojiki is a collection of Japan`s ancient legends and early myths. In this episode, learn about how they were compiled, and sample the tales held within.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Infinite Entertainment the Kojiki!
Omoshirosa Mugendai, Kojiki!
おもしろさ無限大, 古事記!

REGULAR.description:
The monk known as Ikkyu had a unique perspective that left a big impact on the culture of the Muromachi period. This episode features the story of his high born origins and the intellectual rigors of studying in a temple.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Riddle Me This, Ikkyu Sojun-san!
Tonchi o Kikasero, Ikkyuu Soujun-san!
とんちをきかせろ, 一休宗純さん!

REGULAR.description:
Kyokutei Bakin spent 28 years telling the epic tale of Nanso Satomi Hakkenden, which numbered a total of 106 volumes upon completion. But if you`re in a rush to get the broad strokes, here`s a summary for you that`ll take less than ten minutes!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Neko nanoni, Satomi Hakkenden!
They Might Be Cats, but It`s Still the Chronicles of the Eight Dog Warriors!
猫なのに, 里見八犬伝!

REGULAR.description:
The Kojiki, and this episode, tells the story of Yamato Takeru, an imperial prince who struggled to distinguish himself from his countless siblings and ended up becoming a legendary hero in the process.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: One Legendary Errand... Yamato Takeru!
Otsukai wa Densetsu e... Yamato Takeru!
お使いは伝説へ... ヤマトタケル!

REGULAR.description:
Cats are natural born ninja, so who better to explain the kind of trouble that the historical agents of subterfuge got up to?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ninjatte Nan ja?
What the Heck`s a Ninja?
忍者ってなんじゃ?

REGULAR.description:
Despite the associations that have become attached to his name, Hattori Hanzo wasn`t actually a ninja himself. But despite that, the fierce Tokugawa samurai from the ninja province of Iga proved to be a force of nature.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: My Dad`s a Ninja, Hattori Hanzo!
Papa wa Ninja, Hattori Hanzou!
パパは忍者, 服部半蔵!

REGULAR.description:
Kano Eitoku was a master painter, who produced painted screens for the likes of Oda Nobunaga and Ashikaga Yoshiteru. Find out what it takes for an artist to mesmerize the military monsters of the Sengoku wars!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nonstop Artist, Kanou Eitoku!
The Non-Stop Artist, Kano Eitoku!
ノンストップアーティスト, 狩野永徳!

REGULAR.description:
Katsura Kotaro of Choshu and Saigo Takamori of Satsuma. These two would be the lyncpins of the Joi revolution that disposed of Tokugawa rule, but they didn`t always get along.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dou Naru? Dou Naru? Sacchou Doumei!
What`s Going to Happen? What Should We Do? The Satcho Alliance!
どうなる? どうする? 薩長同盟!

REGULAR.description:
Thanks to Sakamoto Ryoma`s peacemaking, the groups trying to end the Tokugawa shogunate and restore imperial rule are now on the same page. With the Shinsengumi prowling the streets of Tokyo looking for rebels, who will come out on top?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Even Saigo Can Run Out of Patience?! Everybody`s Army Advances
Saigou no Kao mo Sando made!? Morimori Shingun Hen
西郷の顔も三度まで!? ~モリモリ進軍編~

REGULAR.description:
Oda Nobunaga`s conquest of Japan made him a lot of enemies. And after an attack on the Asakura clan, allies to his brother-in-law Azai Nagamasa, he inadvertently gives rise to a partnership that might spell his own doom!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nobunaga Houimou, Sono Kage ni Combi Ai Ari!
The Nobunaga Encirclement, and the Partnerships That Made It!
信長包囲網, その影にコンビ愛あり!

REGULAR.description:
When your temples are made of wood, and your elaborate religious works of art are also made of wood, fire is bad news. Thankfully a pair of sculpting aces like Unkei and Kaikei around to make up for any lost works!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hotoke-sama o Tsukuru Otoko-tachi, Unkei Kaikei!
The Men Who Make Buddhas, Unkei and Kaikei!
仏様を造る男たち, 運慶・快慶!

REGULAR.description:
The Fujiwara clan were a dominant force in the politics of Heian era Japan. So much so that even military powerhouses like the Minamoto brothers turned to them for patronage!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koko wa Ougon Paradise, Oushuu Fujiwara-shi!
This Is the Golden Paradise! The Fujiwaras of Oshu!
ここは黄金パラダイス, 奥州藤原氏!

REGULAR.description:
The Sankin Kotai was a system created by Tokugawa Iemitsu in order to ensure that the daimyo under his rule would have a degree of cohesion. It was also a major pain in the neck for those daimyos, who had to plan for a major pilgrimage to Edo every other year! Moving that kind of distance every few months in the 17th century wasn`t easy!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Go! Sankin Kotai!
Let`s Go! Sankinkoutai!
レッツゴー! 参勤交代!

REGULAR.description:
The Onin war created the chaos that would usher in the Sengoku period, and turmoil like that always spells trouble for the common people. Thankfully, some samurai like Hojo Soun were willing to rise up and help the helpless.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Uprisings to Protect the Weak, and Stand Against the Strong! Hojo Soun!
Yowaki o Tasuke Tsuyoki o Kujiku Gekokujou, Houjou Souun!
弱きを助け強きをくじく下克上, 北条早雲!

REGULAR.description:
The flames of Sengoku warfare didn`t spare southern Japan, where the Chosokabe clan fought for dominance. Learn about how the leader of Tosa province, Motochika manage to find off invasion and expand his own territory.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Henshin Da! Honoo no Bushou, Chousokabe Motochika!
Metamorphosis! The General of Flame, Chosokabe Motochika!
変身だ! 炎の武将, 長宗我部元親!

REGULAR.description:
The Shimazu clan of Satsuma managed to expand from their province to take over the entire island of Kyushu. And in time even the man who had unified Japan, Tokugawa Ieyasu, would come to fear how tough they could be!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Enjoy Kyuushuu Heitei, Shimazu Yoshihiro!
Let`s Enjoy Unifying Kyushu! Shimazu Yoshiiro
レッツエンジョイ九州統一, 島津義弘!

REGULAR.description:
It`s the clan so nice, they rose to eminence twice! Find out about the Odawara Hojo clan and how they loomed large throughout Kanto before Toyotomi Hideyoshi came after them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gonin Sorotte Odawara Houjou-shi!
Together They Are: The Hojo Clan of Odawara!
五人そろって小田原北条氏!

REGULAR.description:
After traveling to Tang China to study, Kukai was the founder of the Shingon school of Buddhism. See how his return to a politically fraught Japan created the opportunity to spread his teachings.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: He`s One Cool Guy?! Kukai!
Kikeba Soukai!? Kuukai!
聞けば爽快!? 空海!

REGULAR.description:
Waka poems were a popular art form in the Heian period, enough that the famous poet Fujiwara no Sadaie and Emperor Go-Toba sought to put together a selected collection of chosen verses.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Hundred Cats Chosen for the Hyakumeow Isshu!
Hyaku Nyan Erande, Hyaku Nyan Isshu!
百猫[にゃん]えらんで. 百猫[にゃん]一首!

REGULAR.description:
After Oda Nobunaga`s assassination at the hands of Akechi Mitsuhide, Tokugawa Ieyasu found himself on the run in hostile category. Find out how he managed make the dangerous trek home through the land of Iga.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ieyasu wa Tenka Kuronin! Iga Koeru Hen
Ieyasu, Japan`s Great Struggler: The Crossing of Iga
家康は天下の苦労人! ~伊賀越え編~
Special
ゼロからわかる皇室&元号SP
Opening 1
Opening 2
Ending 1
Ending 2
Neko Neko Nihonshi (2018)
Meow Meow Japanese History (2018)
ねこねこ日本史 (2018)
猫猫日本史 第三季
猫猫日本史 (2018)
